modules.description: Computes 32-bit cyclic redundancy checks (CRC) for data in cstruct buffers or string segments. Accepts an optional initial CRC value to support incremental computation. Useful for verifying data integrity in network protocols, file formats, and storage systems like Ethernet, ZIP archives, and PNG images.

Computes 32-bit CRC values for strings and cstruct buffers, supporting incremental computation with an optional initial CRC value. Works directly with `cstruct` and string data to verify integrity in formats like ZIP, PNG, and Ethernet frames. Used in network protocols and storage systems where CRC32 is required for error detection.
